label: Acoustical Physics of Music
description: Acoustical physics associated with music and musical instruments, propagation of sound waves in and from musical instruments, and the biological physics of human hearing. Investigation of topics via advanced laboratory and data acquisition techniques. 4 undergraduate hours. 4 graduate hours. Prerequisite: PHYS 213 and PHYS 214.
courseSectionInformation: 4 undergraduate hours. 4 graduate hours. Prerequisite: PHYS 213 and PHYS 214.
